sentences.en: Article 66 Lower riparian owners shall not obstruct stream flows from high land.
sentences.cn: 第66条(自然流水之承水义务)由高地自然流至之水,低地所有权人不得妨阻.

sentences.en: Located in the Aba county Jinchuan Jinchuan riparian big, small mountain left.
sentences.cn: 座落在阿坝州金川县城大金川河岸, 小照壁山后左侧.

sentences.en: Nonetheless, it can provide a basis for Nile riparian to negotiate and settle their dispute.
sentences.cn: 然而无论如何, 国际法可以为尼罗河流域各国通过磋商解决争议提供有力的依据.

sentences.en: Riparian zone is a special area of submerged land which appears seasonally because of level fluctuation.
sentences.cn: 消落区是随季节性水位涨落而使库区周边被淹土地周期性出露于水面的一段特殊区域.

sentences.en: The fortunes of New Orleans have always depended on its riparian location.
sentences.cn: 新奥尔良的财富一直与其河岸的位置息息相关.

trans.tran_cn: 河边的，水滨的，河岸拥有人
trans.tran_en: of, inhabiting, or situated on the bank of a river
